definition: to go online/to connect to the Internet/(of a document etc) to be uploaded to the Internet/(tennis, volleyball etc) to move in close to the net
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: LX, do you see in the Internet.

sentences.chinese: 中国现在有如此多的人都在上网。

you just go to online and find out Chinatown best restaurants, and you can have it.
